org.apache.giraph.comm.messages

类 SimpleMessageStore<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.comm.messages.SimpleMessageStore<I,M,T>
  • 类型参数:
    I - Vertex id
    M - Message data
    T - Type of object which holds messages for one vertex
    所有已实现的接口:
    BasicMessageStore<I,M>, MessageStore<I,M>, MessageStoreByPartition<I,M>, org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable
    直接已知子类:
    ByteArrayMessagesPerVertexStore, OneMessagePerVertexStore

    public abstract class SimpleMessageStore<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,T>
extends Object
implements MessageStoreByPartition<I,M>
    Abstract class for MessageStoreByPartition which allows any kind of object to hold messages for one vertex. Simple in memory message store implemented with a two level concurrent hash map.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      protected ImmutableClassesGiraphConfiguration<I,?,?,M> config
      Giraph configuration
      protected ConcurrentMap<Integer,ConcurrentMap<I,T>> map
      Map from partition id to map from vertex id to messages for that vertex
      protected CentralizedServiceWorker<I,?,?,M> service
      Service worker

      • getOrCreatePartitionMap

        protected ConcurrentMap<I,T> getOrCreatePartitionMap(int partitionId)
        If there is already a map of messages related to the partition id return that map, otherwise create a new one, put it in global map and return it.
        参数:
        partitionId - Id of partition
        返回:
        Message map for this partition
